images.title: It's Republic Day in India
images.caption: It's Republic Day in India
images.desc: In honour of India's upcoming 70th Republic Day (which just so happens to share the same date as Australia Day), we're featuring an uncommon view of the Taj Mahal. It's on this day that India celebrates its official beginning as an independent democratic republic after having endured nearly a century of British rule. Republic Day events include presentations of the Padma Awards (national service honours), a Republic Day parade in New Delhi, and other ceremonies.
